name: dinner in Japan
caption: After graduating from college I lived in Japan for three years, immersing myself in the language and culture.

name: Fuji
caption: One highlight while in Japan was climbing to the top of Mt. Fuji to see the sunrise.

name: Elephant
caption: Here I am riding an elephant in Thailand!

name: Venice
caption: I spent several months in Greece, Italy, Slovenkia, and the Czech Republic.  Venice is amazing.

name: Family
caption: I am married with two children and part of a close-knit family.

name: Pride
caption: I owned and operated a contracting business for over 15 years.

name: Jersey
caption: I have been a competitive cyclist for several years.  Here I am as the season points leader at the Velodrome.

name: team
caption: Competing as a team is the most fun!

name: graduation
caption: I graduated from an intensive full-stack web development program at Galvanize in July 2016.
